data.title: Designer Clothing, Shoes, Handbags & More
data.meta_description: Free shipping & returns available as well as curbside pickup! Shop online for designer clothing, handbags, accessories, items for the home & more!
data.text:
Like no other store in the world, Bloomingdale's elevates life to an artform. Because the way we dress, how we live, and how we move through our space and our day tells the story of us, Bloomingdale's website and stores have, from the beginning, strived to help you celebrate your past and create your future. Curated for the mosaic of nuances and experiences that make you who you are, our collections come from beloved fashion houses and little-known designers alike. They are the embodiment of everyday luxury and have the power to transform not only your look, but your life.

Women's Clothes. Bloomingdale's online collection of women's clothing features looks for your workout and your workday, coffee with friends, date night, and your down time. And with styles from Veronica Beard, MOTHER, and Alice and Olivia, among others, you can dress for wherever the day takes you.

Shoes. Like Bloomingdale's stores, Bloomingdale's official site is home to special collections, exclusive offerings, and timeless designs from revered brands like Gucci, Stuart Weitzman, Jimmy Choo, and UGGÂ®. With women's shoes in seasonal styles and year-round favorites, you can elevate your look literally and figuratively.

Handbags. Designed for form and for function, our handbag collection features wearable works of art from Tory Burch, Saint Laurent, MZ Wallace, Bottega Veneta, and more. With the power to help organize your on-the-go life, complement your look, or change it entirely, you'll find handbags in innovative styles and classic silhouettes.

Jewelry & Accessories. If the devil, as they say, is in the details, then women's accessories are the one component to your look that you should never overlook. Throughout Bloomingdales' online collection from ZYDO, David Yurman, Roberto Coin, and others, you'll find the perfect accessories for every facet of your life.

Beauty. With timeless shades and vibrant color palettes, distinctive fragrances, and luxe skin care products, Bloomingdale's can empower you to express yourself your way. Featuring collections from CREED, Maison Francis Kurkdijan, and Sisley-Paris, among others, you can celebrate your individuality and your own unique brand of beauty.

Menswear. Trend-forward designs and classic looks are the hallmarks of Bloomingdale's menswear collection. Curated for days at the office, night out, afternoons at the gym, and low-key weekends, you'll find versatile styles by Ralph Lauren, REISS, Ted Baker, ALLSAINTS, and more.

Kids' Clothes & Gear. For little bodies, hands, and minds, our selection of kids' clothing from brands like KatieJnyc and Appaman, and gear from UPPAbaby and Nuna, can help you shape their world--sartorially, physically, and intellectually.
